includedAssets.title: Pilot
includedAssets.synopsis: Emma's life is transformed by the sudden appearance of her long-lost son and a book of fairy-tales that he claims are all true. Fantasy drama.
includedAssets.shortSynopsis: Emma's life is transformed by the sudden appearance of her long-lost son and a book of fairy-tales that he claims are all true. Fantasy drama.
includedAssets.mediumSynopsis: Emma's life is transformed by the sudden appearance of her long-lost son and a book of fairy-tales that he claims are all true. Fantasy drama.

includedAssets.title: The Thing You Love Most
includedAssets.altTitle: S1, Ep2 - The Thing You Love Most
includedAssets.synopsis: Regina uses every means possible to get Emma away from Henry and Storybrooke, while a flashback reveals more about the curse.
includedAssets.shortSynopsis: Regina uses every means possible to get Emma away from Henry and Storybrooke, while a flashback reveals more about the curse.
includedAssets.mediumSynopsis: Regina uses every means possible to get Emma away from Henry and Storybrooke, while a flashback reveals more about the curse.

includedAssets.title: Snow Falls
includedAssets.synopsis: Prince Charming and Snow White's first meeting is revealed, as Emma persuades Mary Margaret to read to a comatose stranger from the book.
includedAssets.shortSynopsis: Prince Charming and Snow White's first meeting is revealed, as Emma persuades Mary Margaret to read to a comatose stranger from the book.
includedAssets.mediumSynopsis: Prince Charming and Snow White's first meeting is revealed, as Emma persuades Mary Margaret to read to a comatose stranger from the book.

includedAssets.title: The Price Of Gold
includedAssets.altTitle: S1, Ep4 - The Price Of Gold
includedAssets.synopsis: As flashbacks show Cinderella making a deal with Rumplestiltskin, Emma tries to help a pregnant woman escape Mr Gold.
includedAssets.shortSynopsis: As flashbacks show Cinderella making a deal with Rumplestiltskin, Emma tries to help a pregnant woman escape Mr Gold.
includedAssets.mediumSynopsis: As flashbacks show Cinderella making a deal with Rumplestiltskin, Emma tries to help a pregnant woman escape Mr Gold.

includedAssets.title: That Still Small Voice
includedAssets.altTitle: S1, Ep5 - That Still Small Voice
includedAssets.synopsis: In fairy-tale world, a young Jiminy Cricket tries to leave the family business. In Storybrooke, Henry explores a mysterious sinkhole.
includedAssets.shortSynopsis: In fairy-tale world, a young Jiminy Cricket tries to leave the family business. In Storybrooke, Henry explores a mysterious sinkhole.
includedAssets.mediumSynopsis: In fairy-tale world, a young Jiminy Cricket tries to leave the family business. In Storybrooke, Henry explores a mysterious sinkhole.

includedAssets.title: The Shepherd
includedAssets.synopsis: More information on Charming's life is revealed, as David faces up to a difficult choice between Kathryn and Mary Margaret.
includedAssets.shortSynopsis: More information on Charming's life is revealed, as David faces up to a difficult choice between Kathryn and Mary Margaret.
includedAssets.mediumSynopsis: More information on Charming's life is revealed, as David faces up to a difficult choice between Kathryn and Mary Margaret.

includedAssets.title: The Heart Is A Lonely Hunter
includedAssets.altTitle: S1, Ep7 - The Heart Is A Lonely Hunter
includedAssets.synopsis: Flashbacks show the Evil Queen's attempt to murder Snow White, while Graham and Emma's kiss has unexpected consequences.
includedAssets.shortSynopsis: Flashbacks show the Evil Queen's attempt to murder Snow White, while Graham and Emma's kiss has unexpected consequences.
includedAssets.mediumSynopsis: Flashbacks show the Evil Queen's attempt to murder Snow White, while Graham and Emma's kiss has unexpected consequences.

includedAssets.title: Desperate Souls
includedAssets.synopsis: As Emma decides to run for sheriff, pitting Gold against Regina, flashbacks show Rumplestiltskin trying to keep his son from a war.

includedAssets.mediumSynopsis: As Emma decides to run for sheriff, pitting Gold against Regina, flashbacks show Rumplestiltskin trying to keep his son from a war.

includedAssets.title: True North
includedAssets.synopsis: While Emma tries to help two siblings find their father, flashbacks show the Evil Queen coercing two children into stealing from a blind witch.

includedAssets.mediumSynopsis: While Emma tries to help two siblings find their father, flashbacks show the Evil Queen coercing two children into stealing from a blind witch.

includedAssets.title: 7:15 A.M.
includedAssets.synopsis: Emma and Regina grow increasingly suspicious of Storybrooke's new arrival, while Mary Margaret and Snow White both struggle with love.

includedAssets.mediumSynopsis: Emma and Regina grow increasingly suspicious of Storybrooke's new arrival, while Mary Margaret and Snow White both struggle with love.

includedAssets.title: Fruit Of The Poisonous Tree
includedAssets.altTitle: S1, Ep11 - Fruit Of The Poisonous Tree
includedAssets.synopsis: David and Mary Margaret attempt to unleash their unrequited love and Emma works with Sidney to expose Regina's corruption.
includedAssets.shortSynopsis: David and Mary Margaret attempt to unleash their unrequited love and Emma works with Sidney to expose Regina's corruption.
includedAssets.mediumSynopsis: David and Mary Margaret attempt to unleash their unrequited love and Emma works with Sidney to expose Regina's corruption.

includedAssets.title: What Happened To Frederick
includedAssets.altTitle: S1, Ep13 - What Happened To Frederick
includedAssets.synopsis: As David resolves to tell Kathryn of his secret relationship with Mary Margaret, Regina plots to keep them apart.

includedAssets.mediumSynopsis: As David resolves to tell Kathryn of his secret relationship with Mary Margaret, Regina plots to keep them apart.

includedAssets.title: Dreamy
includedAssets.synopsis: While flashbacks show a forbidden romance in Grumpy's past, Emma tries to learn more about Kathryn's sudden disappearance.

includedAssets.synopsis: As David fends off questions about the disappearance of his wife, flashbacks show Red Riding Hood taking on the wolf terrorising her village.

includedAssets.title: A Land Without Magic

includedAssets.synopsis: Emma decides to form an unlikely alliance when Henry's life comes under threat. Season finale.

includedAssets.title: Season 1
includedAssets.synopsis: Emma Swan's life is far from a happy ending, that is until her 28th birthday when a mysterious book of fairy-tales, and the sudden appearance of her long-lost son who claims they are all true, transforms her life. Emmy-nominated fantasy drama starring Ginnifer Goodwin and Jennifer Morrison.
includedAssets.shortSynopsis: Emma's life is transformed by a book of fairy-tales and the reappearance of her long-lost son. Fantasy drama starring Jennifer Morrison.
includedAssets.mediumSynopsis: Emma Swan's life is far from a happy ending, that is until her 28th birthday when a mysterious book of fairy-tales, and the sudden appearance of her long-lost son who claims they are all true, transforms her life. Emmy-nominated fantasy drama starring Ginnifer Goodwin and Jennifer Morrison.

includedIn.title: Once Upon A Time
includedIn.synopsis: After her long-lost son suddenly reappears, Emma Swan is taken to Storybrooke, a mysterious town whose residents bear a striking resemblance to fairy-tale characters. There she must find her parents, defeat a wicked queen and break a dark curse.
includedIn.shortSynopsis: After her long-lost son reappears, Emma Swan is taken to Storybrooke, a town whose residents bear a striking resemblance to fairy-tale characters.
includedIn.mediumSynopsis: After her long-lost son suddenly reappears, Emma Swan is taken to Storybrooke, a mysterious town whose residents bear a striking resemblance to fairy-tale characters. There she must find her parents, defeat a wicked queen and break a dark curse.
